Translations.Text: And the leaders of his people who did not believe and denied the meeting of the hereafter and whom We had made to enjoy in the life of the world said, â€œThis is no more than a man like yourselves, he eats from that from which you eat and he drinks from that which you drink
And if you obey a man like yourselves, then you will certainly be of the losers
Does he promise you, that when you are dead and you become (part of the) soil and bones, that you will be brought out (alive again)
Far, far is that which you are promised
There is nothing except our life of this world, we die and we live and we will not be of those who are raised (after death)
He is nothing but a man who has forged a lie against Allah and we are not of those who believe in him
He said, "My Fosterer! help me because they deny me
He said, "In a little while they will definitely become regretters
So a loud cry took hold of them in reality, then We made them rubbish, so away with the unjust people
Then after them We produced other generations
No community can advance its term nor can it postpone it

Then We sent Our messengers one after another. Whenever its messenger came to a community, it denied him, so We made some of them to follow others and We made them stories, so away with the people who do not believe
Then We sent Musa and his brother Harun with Our signs and clear authority
to Firawn and the leaders of his (people), but they considered themselves great and they were a transgressing people
So they said, "Shall we believe in two men like us while (the people) of their community are our servants
So they denied them, therefore they became of those who were destroyed
And We gave Musa the book that they may be guided
And We made the son of Maryam and his mother a sign; and for shelter We took them to a high place, with springs, (which was) meant for staying
